name: pressurizing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
pressurize
to keep the air pressure in a submarine, plane, etc. at a level that is suitable for breathing

UK (US pressure) to strongly persuade someone to do something they do not want to do: He was pressurized into signing the agreement.
